answers.answer: Me too im high risk because i had a stillbirth last pregnancy. I cant wait for my baby to be born so that i can stop worrying about everything.

I am considered high risk because i have lost 3 babies all in the 1st trimester, i am now on my second trimester and i want time to go fast so that i can stop worrying that something might be wrong, but i have to leave it all in God's hands:)
Same here i lost 3 & my second trimester....cnt wait to have my baby boy so i can stop worring as well...May-22-15
I lost three in the first trimester and one in the second trimester so they have considered me as high risk
I'm also high risk, I had a still birth and a miscarriage, and I have a weak cervix ... I'm so excited to see my bby girl in May!

I'm high risk I had my son in June this year. He was 16weeks and couldn't survive outside he was still alive when I had him but was only alive for a second when he cane out. So I'm considered high risk but I am now 19weeks and can't wait to find out what I'm having and May 15 to come around but I don't want my baby to come any sooner I want to make sure he or she is perfect.
I have twins plus a minor heart problem

I'm considered high risk because I had my first son at 32 weeks. I'm getting shots once a week and seeing my doctor more now then I did last time. Its kinda annoying but they say its needed . On top of that my husband and I both have herpes so I take meds all the time to control that
Yup high risk too. 2nd baby..High blood pressure and gestational diabetes.  Yaay. :(

question: Are there any other high risk moms on here . I'm on my second pregnancy and I am considered high risk. I just want to know if anyone else is going through the same thing as me.
title: High Risk
